name: Star Crash
description:
Star Crash

Defend the Earth from the evil alien Invaders!

15 levels.

Available for Windows, Mac and Linux

Keys:

A, D = Left/ Right

Space = Fire

P / Escape = Pause

W,S = Up / Down on Pause menu

Joypad supported.

 2021

Made using Godot Game Engine.

Thanks for looking!
